short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension that you can use to get the details of top three jobs posted on LinkedIn of the category that you search forâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension that you can use to get the details of top three jobs posted on LinkedIn of the category that you search for in the search bar. You don't have to open the app specially to look for the job posts, just use the extension to do so.
